short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool that helps you split payments across multiple cards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kasheesh allows users to split their payments and purchases across multiple credit, debit, and gift cards.

Our new Multi-Use Card allows you to seamlessly combine multiple credit and debit cards into one powerful, reusable card. This means you can now ‘Set It & Forget It’ without having to get a new Kasheesh card for each purchase at your favorite merchants, for Utility Payments, Rent, and more!

Why You'll Love It:

* Flexibility: Combine multiple cards into one for easier management.
* Convenience: Set it and forget it. Save the card with your favorite merchant or for recurring payments.
* Control: Edit your card at any time to use different cards and splits, but keep the same Kasheesh card number.
